title: Reopen Mapping Project illustrates health and job tradeoffs for different policies in US cities
author: Laura Counts
excerpt:
As states and cities grapple with how to reopen businesses, schools, and other staples of everyday life amid surges in COVID-19 infections, Asst. Prof. Abhishek Nagaraj and a team of researchers across four universities are building an interactive website that shows how different policies affect employment and the number of deaths from the virus.
